VacuumdConfiguration.statement: DELETE FROM events WHERE NOT EXISTS (SELECT svclosteventid FROM outages WHERE svclosteventid = events.eventid UNION SELECT svcregainedeventid FROM outages WHERE svcregainedeventid = events.eventid UNION SELECT eventid FROM notifications WHERE eventid = events.eventid) AND eventtime < now() - interval '6 weeks';

trigger.name: selectResolvers
trigger.statement: SELECT *, now() as _ts FROM alarms WHERE alarmType=2

action.name: garbageCollect
action.statement: DELETE FROM alarms WHERE COALESCE(lastautomationtime, lasteventtime) < now() - interval '1 day'

action.name: deletePastAlarms
action.statement: DELETE from alarms WHERE severity <= 3 AND COALESCE(lastautomationtime, lasteventtime) < now() - interval '10 minutes'

action.name: clearProblems
